title: getSurveyAnswerState
name: getSurveyAnswerState
description: Get response rate for survey

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Main Fields.description: Basic status of answers (3ll-entered intro, 4ll-entered frist page, 5ll-started responding, 5-partially completed, 6-completed)

title: getSurveyDashboard
name: getSurveyDashboard
description: Get all dashboard data of survey (if survey has no responses, only survey info is returned)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Success 200.description: Object of nubers of all responses by date and hour in day (optional)

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
	"info": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyInfo],
	"statuses": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyStatuses],
	"datetime": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyDateTimeRange],
	"redirections": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyDateTimeRange],
	"paradata": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyParadata],
	"responserate": [SEE OUTPUT OF FUNCTION getSurveyAnswerState]
      }

title: getSurveyDateTimeRange
name: getSurveyDateTimeRange
description: Get object of nubers of all responses by date and hour in day (keys as date and hour in day, values as number of answers at that time)

SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

title: getSurveyStatuses

title: addLink
name: addLink
description: Add new public link (hash link of data or analysis). Example of hash (public) link: https://www.1ka.si/podatki/50/5BABEC6D/ ([SITE_ROOT]/podatki/[SURVEY_ID]/[HASH_CODE]/)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: Broad type of content of hash link (analysis, data) (if data, parameter m is not needed)
Specific type of content of hash link (analysis_creport, descriptor, frequency, charts, sumarnik) (when parameter a is "data", this parameter is not needed)

title: deleteLink
name: deleteLink
description: Delete specific public link (hash link of data or analysis)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: Hash code of public link to delete

title: deleteSurveyUnit
name: deleteSurveyUnit
description: Delete unit/response in survey data (whole response of a respondent)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: ID of unit/response to delete

title: getSurveyFrequencies
name: getSurveyFrequencies
description: Get frequencies for all radio, checkbox, dropdown and plain text questions in the survey

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Question Fields.description: Id of question (left side of '_' is actual ID of question, right side is ID of sequence within question)
Code of question type: 0-single choice (radio, dropdown), 1-multiple choice (checkbox), 2-text

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: getSurveyHashes
name: getSurveyHashes
description: Get all hash links of survey. Example of hash (public) link: https://www.1ka.si/podatki/50/5BABEC6D/ ([SITE_ROOT]/podatki/[SURVEY_ID]/[HASH_CODE]/)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Main Fields.description: 0-refresh mode off, 1-auto refresh site every x seconds
If not NULL or "", this password is needed to access public link
Broad type of content of hash link (analysis, data)

Hash link Fields.description: ID of survey that hash link belong to
Broad type of content of hash link (analysis, data)
Specific type of content of hash link (analysis_creport, descriptor, frequency, charts, sumarnik)

title: getSurveyResponseData
name: getSurveyResponseData
description: Get basic info and all values/answers of response

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Success 200.description: Status code of response (6-Completed, 5-partially completed, 4-entered first page, 3-entered intro)
Keys as names of values, values as answers

title: copyQuestion
name: copyQuestion
description: Make a copy of specific question and put it +1 in order to original question on same page

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: ID of question to copy

title: createQuestion
name: createQuestion
description: Add new question to survey, put it on last spot of given group/page in survey

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

GET parameter.description: Id of survey to add new question to

POST parameter.description: Text of question
Id of page/group to put question in (default is last page/group)
Type of question (0-radio, 1-checkbox, 2-text)
Reminder code for question (0-no reminder, 1-soft reminder, 2-hard reminder) (default is 0)
Text of option other to add (for cshoose type questions)
Height size in lines of text field (for text question) (default is single line)
Array of options to add to question (for cshoose type questions)

SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Value Fields.description: Short mark of value in question (value name)
Sequence number of value in the question

title: updateOrCreateOption
name: updateOrCreateOption
description: Update or add a value/option to question (for picking type of question - single or multiple choice)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: Title/text of option/value
ID of question to add new option/value (needed only for adding)
ID of option/value to update (needed only for updating)

title: updateQuestion
name: updateQuestion
description: Update basic question properties

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: ID of question
Title/text of question
Reminder code for question (0-no reminder, 1-soft reminder, 2-hard reminder)
Text of option "Other" (update or add)

title: BlockRepeatedIP
name: BlockRepeatedIP
description: Block repeated IP (do not allow respondent to respond to survey again for the next x minutes)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: In minutes - if this parameter is not set, blocking IP will be turned off (possible options are 10, 20, 30, 60, 720, 1440, 0-ip blocking off)

title: SurveyActivation
name: SurveyActivation
description: Activate (for 3 months from now) or deactivate survey (start it or stop it)

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: If this parameter is not set, survey will be deactivated (0-deactivate survey, 1-activate survey)

title: copySurvey
name: copySurvey
description: Make a copy of specific survey

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

title: createSurvey
name: createSurvey
description: Create survey with questions

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Survey fields.description: Text of introduction or conclusion (set it on "" for default text)
Array of all questions to add to survey

Question fields.description: Order of question sequence to place this question in page
Reminder code for question (0-no reminder, 1-soft reminder, 2-hard reminder) (default is 0)
Text of option other to add (for radio and checkbox)
Height size in lines of text field (for text question) (default is single line)
Array of options to add to question (for radio and checkbox)

      }

title: getSurveyInfo
name: getSurveyInfo
description: Get info of survey

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Success 200.description: Current activity of survey (1 – survey is active, 0 – survey is not active)
Blocked IP in minutes – 0 off (1440 = 24h) - if on, respondent can not access to survey again for given minutes

title: getSurveyList
name: getSurveyList
description: Get list of info of all surveys

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

Parameter.description: Optional Limit of surveys to return, DESC order by time of new input (answer)

Success 200.description: Current activity of survey (1 – survey is active, 0 – survey is not active)
Blocked IP in minutes – 0 off (1440 = 24h) - if on, respondent can not access to survey again for given minutes

title: getSurveyResponses
name: getSurveyResponses
description: Get list of numbers of all surveys responses (and info about activity) with keys as survey ID

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

title: updateSurvey
name: updateSurvey
description: Update basic survey properties

Header.description: Identifier to access API (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/api-key)
SHA256 hash token calculated with API key (https://www.1ka.si/d/en/about/1ka-api/example2/get-call-example-php)

POST parameter.description: Title of survey
Title/text of question (only voting)
Introduction text of survey or form ("" stands for default text)
Conclusion text of survey or form ("" stands for default text)
Do we show introduction (0-hide, 1-show)
Do we show conclusion (0-hide, 1-show)
